Project Essentials

Make your forge server üéâ

Get Started ‚Üí

Easy to use

Just drag and drop the module files into the mods folder, and continue creating the server.

Module system

Install only the modules you need. It will also help reduce server overload.

Client independence

All modules are independent of their presence on the client and no requires resource-packs with localization.

Really essentials

The project consists of a many modules, 8 modules + 1 core module + 2 WIP* modules.

Performance

Project modules do not overload the server even if all (9) modules are installed.

Multi version support

Currently I support two versions of minecraft `1.14.4` and `1.15.2` with Forge. I'll support more versions.

* - work in progress
